"Lerach": "Huh? Oh, you're the person Xitrae mentioned."
"Yeah, so while we were transporting the Dango, we got jumped by a group of DOLLS along the way, right?"
"One of the trucks took an attack from behind, damaging the container in the process."
"I was focused on the fight, so I didn't get a good look at the condition of our cargo..."
"When we realized the damage, some of what was inside was missing."
"All I managed to catch a glimpse of was something \"round\" running off into some tall grass..."
"As ARKS, our health is wealth. Staying healthy is most important."
"Next time, I want to make sure we guard the trucks properly."
